name: Milky Day
description:
Today the cows decided to revolt against humanity. Time has come for The Laitier to destroy them.

You have to survive a never ending storm of cows.

Some cows can shoot projectiles that does 1 damage.

If a cow touches you, you also take 1 damage.

You have 10 hitpoints. You can't heal.

Use WASD to move The Laitier.

Left-clic to shoot a bag of milk  towards the mouse position THAT EXPLODES once it hits a cow.
